newsitem.title: UK: BZW hires CSFB exec to head Europe credit business.
newsitem.headline: BZW hires CSFB exec to head Europe credit business.

text.p: BZW has hired Robert Morrice as managing director and head of credit business, Europe, it said in a statement on Friday.
Morrice was formerly managing director and head of fixed income sales at CS First Boston in London, it added.
In his new position, Morrice will be in charge of BZW's European origination, syndication and secondary trading operations for non-sterling currencies.
He will have joint responsibility for credit derivatives, asset swaps and credit research, the statement said, and will report to Bob Diamond, chief executive of global markets.
